jmr.expansion

Class LabelProperties.LabeledColorDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmr.descriptor.MediaDescriptorAdapter<java.awt.image.BufferedImage>
      • jmr.expansion.LabelProperties
        • jmr.expansion.LabelProperties.LabeledColorDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, jmr.descriptor.MediaDescriptor<java.awt.image.BufferedImage>
    Enclosing class:
    LabelProperties

    public static class LabelProperties.LabeledColorDescriptor
extends LabelProperties
    Special case when a LabelProperties is composed by two labels, one for describe the cathegory of the object and another one for describe its visual properties, specifically its dominants colors if specified it will use fuzzy colors space for label the colors
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • LabeledColorDescriptor

        public LabeledColorDescriptor(jmr.descriptor.label.LabelDescriptor Label,
                              jmr.descriptor.label.LabelDescriptor Color)
        Construct a descriptor of this tyhpe using the given label for the category object and the given color for the color label. It is used for create a query for the Data base
        Parameters:

        Color - The label of the color

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                 java.lang.Boolean fuzzy)
        Initialize this descriptor using the given image, if fuzzy variable is true it will use fuzzy color spaces for label the colors.
        Parameters:
        img - The image used to calculate this descriptor
        fuzzy - Condition that specify if fuzzy color spaces will be used
